EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Event_M1 Summit_Q215.Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal at M1 Summit - Thanks for Joining us!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Pivotal was proud to sponsor the M1 Summit <http://m1summitnyc2015.splashthat.com/> recently. As a continuing sponsor we find great value in meeting everyone and listening to the impactful talks.
We're pleased to share a recent keynote <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-labs/p-o-v/the-secret-behind-silicon-valley> given by Pivotal EVP, Rob Mee, on "The Secret Behind Silicon Valley". This talk focuses on how software is disrupting economies and industries worldwide and how traditional approaches, paradigms, and processes need to change in order to compete in these modern times.
Also, we hope you had a chance to listen to our GM of Mobile Amar Varma at the M1 summit on the session, "How Mobile Will Transform the Next Enterprise Verticals‚Äù - if you missed the talk, it can be found here <https://vimeo.com/129813827>.
To learn more about Pivotal visit our website <http://pivotal.io/labs> or if you have questions please contact us <http://pivotal.io/contact>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
